ValidationRule.description: Comments field is mandatory when Status is Exemption, Reduction, Deferral, Go Early or Accepted where LTA as the Sub Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', ISBLANK(Comments__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Exemption'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Reduction'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Deferral'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Go Early'), AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Accepted'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Status__c, 'Long term agreement') ) ) )
